attributes.action: Conisbrough says NO to the Day Centre Closure and Care Home Closure because of Doncaster Councils budget cuts
attributes.additional_details:
We say NO to the Mayor of Doncaster, Ros Jones, who has laid out plans for where the axe will fall over the next three years as part of the latest £109million wave of cuts.

Conisbrough says No to the following

No to Our elderly Care homes being closed this will effect the most venerable people in our community

No to- Conisbrough Social Education Centre being closed, another group of vulnerable people under threat in out community. Other centres effected are Cedar Social Education Centre, Thorne Social Education centre and Askern Day Centre - all planned for closure in 2014/15)

We say No to, Council tax rises of just under two per cent per year

We say No to - Conisbrough Library becoming community-managed (other libraries under threat Askern, Armthorpe, Bentley, Cantley, Hatfield, Tickhill and Woodlands are all seen as having the potential to be community-run)
